title: I need help logging in. What IS this?

replies.body:
The servers hubs are down, you can directly connect to game servers with the ips such as nebula01.avic.us or walls01.avic.us

Then you can use /server [name] to switch between them.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I have the same error message, just try connecting directly to a server such as "Cronus", "Apollo", "Mczone02"... and so on until you find a game that has some players in it. :)
replies.body_tagged: I have the same error message, just try connecting directly to a server such as "Cronus", "Apollo", "Mczone02"... and so on until you find a game that has some players in it. :)

replies.body: Guys, just give it some time (days), as ivy is so super busy that I am sure the hubs will be back up, and things will be better than ever. They have only been mostly down for a few days, and that perfectly ok, we just need to wait on not expect to be able to play all the time.
replies.body_tagged: Guys, just give it some time (days), as ivy is so super busy that I am sure the hubs will be back up, and things will be better than ever. They have only been mostly down for a few days, and that perfectly ok, we just need to wait on not expect to be able to play all the time.

replies.body: i agree, and the server and staff have my full patience, i was just confused as to whether is was a computer malfunction or the server :O

replies.body: Yes, I would not expect to play much over the next few weeks / months if I were you. I am sure they are working super fast and focused like nothing else matters, so check back in in a few days. Maybe next Saturday or the one after that.
